snippet: Today on the Minute, what Wednesday’s Supreme Court decision means for wealthy donors, Amazon unveils its new set-top box and million-dollar art found on a kitchen wall.
abstract: Today on the Minute, what Wednesday’s Supreme Court decision means for wealthy donors, Amazon unveils its new set-top box and million-dollar art found on a kitchen wall.

headline.main: Times Minute | Amazon's New TV Box
headline.kicker: The New York Times News Minute
